page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: Shardlow and Sawley have their own village halls for local activities; Baby Clinics, Brownies, Badminton, Cubs, Church of England Men's Society, Flower arranging Gardening, Historical Society Karate, Ladies Keep Fit, Mother & Toddler, Mother's Union, Pensioner's, Playgroup, Slimming Club Spire Circle (Young Wives) Women's Institute, Wine-making and Youth Club. Sawley Church Hall hold Barn Dances twice a year and Fashion Shows, and Sequence Dancing. The Hall is used by different 'Pop' groups (mainly out of work youths) for them to practice. Sawley also has a purpose built hall for Badminton where Whist Drives & a Sunday Football League operate. The Hall is also available for parties and wedding receptions.
